title: S8E20 – "Fantastic Things and Eldritch Nightmares" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from The Vesper's Bell, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about abyssal abominations, weird werewolves, turbulent tomes, and cataclysmic contests.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
